ComicInfo.Series: Evil Dead 2: Cradle of the Damned
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ash is back! Groovy Ash-approved new series and first issue available with three covers, including an EC-themed classic by Batman '66 artist Ty Templeton! As if that's not enough, Ash and Annie are back from Hell, hunting down and killing the thousands of Deadite souls loose on Earth. Thank goodness the Dark Ones show up to, well, open the Gateway that sends our heroes into the Mirror Dimension! Did not see that coming!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-------------------------------|--------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Larry Watts | 1 | | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ty Templeton | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Cradle of the Damned
